-- test: multiple pods with deployment --
-- command --
kubectl-actuator --deployment {{deployment}} logger
-- expect:regex --
{{pod[0]}}:
-- expect:regex --
LOGGER\s+LEVEL
-- expect:regex --
ROOT\s+INFO
-- expect:regex --
{{pod[1]}}:
-- expect:regex --
LOGGER\s+LEVEL
-- expect:regex --
ROOT\s+INFO

-- test: label selector --
-- command --
kubectl-actuator --selector component=backend info
-- expect --
{{pod[0]}}:
-- expect --
{{pod[1]}}:
-- expect --
Name:         test-actuator-app
